name: I Need You Now
content: Or do you say nothing at all
I don't know who you are
So hold your hand up if you hear me
Baby your right here in front of me
I don't know who you are
So hold your hand up if you hear me
And i need you now i need you now
I don't know who you are
So hold your hand up if you hear me
And i need you now i need you now
